# pynetlogo

## Overview

This document contains some tests of the [`pynetlogo`](https://pynetlogo.readthedocs.io) Python package, which provides an interface to control [NetLogo](https://ccl.northwestern.edu/netlogo/) from Python.

## Installation

You can install `pynetlogo` using pip:

```
# python -m venv .venv
# source .venv/bin/activate
```

```bash
pip install pynetlogo
```

## Tests

These tests can be found in the [package documentation](https://pynetlogo.readthedocs.io) website.

### Example 1

```{python}
%matplotlib inline

import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
```

```{python}
sns.set_style("white")
sns.set_context("talk")
```

```{python}
import pynetlogo

netlogo = pynetlogo.NetLogoLink(
    gui = True,
    thd = False,
    netlogo_home = "/opt/netlogo-7-0-0",
    jvm_path = "/opt/netlogo-7-0-0/lib/runtime/lib/libjli.so"
)
```


```{python}
netlogo.load_model("./models/Wolf Sheep Predation_v6.nlogo")
netlogo.command("setup")
```
